DOC.brief_summary: To determine the safety and IOP-lowering ability of a test compound in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Safety and Efficacy Study to Evaluate a Glaucoma Therapy in Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension Patients
DOC.criteria: Adult subjects of either sex and any race with openangle glaucoma or ocular hypertension; logMAR visual acuity not worse than 0.6. Clinically relevant ophthalmic or systemic conditions may be excluded.
